snippet.title: Hellion - Official Cinematic Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam Early Access: February 24, 2017


Check out Hellion survival trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2qZoA3byeoI

Hellion is an open world multiplayer space survival game set in a distant star system amidst the ruins of mankind’s first interstellar colony.

Fight for survival in a cruel and mysterious world of humanity's ruined hopes. Gather resources, build your outpost, navigate the ship through the vast outer space, find friends to help you and defeat your foes. Explore derelict ships, discover the hidden story and find your way to stay alive!

Official Site - https://www.playhellion.com/

Follow us on social media channels:

Steam - http://store.steampowered.com/app/588210
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/playhellion/
Twitter - https://twitter.com/playhellion
Reddit - https://www.reddit.com/r/hellion
Wiki - http://hellion.gamepedia.com/Hellion_Wiki

Music by Bogdan Echo Miloševic (Zerostring):
Original song - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uzJi-cSTIn4 
Itunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/slingshot-from-above-single/id1210545224
Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/album/32TuR7cl3ukdqWHboOVDdo
Bandcamp: https://zerostring.bandcamp.com/
Recorded, mixed, mastered and produced by Marko Živanović (Devotion Studios)
Drums played by Milan Jejina (The Yeqy)
Voice acting: Filip Živanović and Bogdan Echo Miloševic
